pageSize.description:
Pagination parameter. Number of items to be collected.
Please use a page size lower or equal to the allowed max page size which is returned as part of the metadata information.
If requested page size is greater than allowed max page size, request will be limited to max page size.
MaxPageSize will be set to 5000 from 1. April 2022

alternateID.description: Applies for both Stock and Non-stock items.  Some fields in this filter applies only for one of these.

salesCategory.description: The Category ID for the sales category, found on the Attributes tab.

addCostPriceStatistics.description: This filter can be used only for stock items, from the Price/cost information tab.

description.description: A brief description of the stock item from the Top part of the window.

inventoryTypes.description: Filter on one or more inventory types: NonStockItem, LaborItem, ServiceItem, ChargeItem, ExpenseItem, FinishedGoodItem, ComponentPartItem or SubassemblyItem

expandCrossReference.description:
These expand fields are by default set to true, but will be changed in the future. 
Set to true to retrieve information about the cross-references (item ID and suppliers/customers ID for the item connected to the item.

expandAttachment.description: Set to true to retrieve information about the attachments connected to the item.

expandAttribute.description: Set to true to retrieve the attribute descriptions used for the item.

expandWarehouseDetail.description: Set to true to retrieve information about the warehouse connected to the item.

expandAccountInformation.description: Set to true to retrieve information about the account information connected to the item.

expandInventoryUnits.description: Set to true to retrieve information about the units of measure connected to the item.

expandSupplierDetails.description: Set to true to retrieve details about the supplier connected to the item.

expandSalesCategories.description: Set to true to retrieve details about the sales categories connected to the item.

expandNote.description: Set to true to retrieve the note value connected to the item.

attachmentLastModifiedDateTime.description: System retrieved information for last modified date and time for attachment.

attachmentLastModifiedDateTimeCondition.description: System retrieved information for state/condition for attachment.

numberToRead.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

skipRecords.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

greaterThanValue.description: Greater than value. The item which is the object for this, varies from API to API.

lastModifiedDateTime.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

lastModifiedDateTimeCondition.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

**attachments**: Attributes tab >

**baseUnit**: Mandatory field: General information tab > Unit of measurement section > Base unit* > The UoM used as the base unit for this stock item.
**body**: The top part > Body *> A brief description of the stock item.
**costPriceStatistics**: Price/cost information tab >
**averageCost**: Cost price statistics section > Average cost > The average cost for the stock item.
**lastCost**: Cost price statistics section > Last cost > The last standard cost used for the stock item.
**maxCost**: Cost price statistics section > Max. cost > The maximum cost for the stock item.
**minCost**: Cost price statistics section > Min. cost > The minimum cost for the stock item.
**crossReferences**: Cross-reference tab >
**currentCost**: Price/cost information tab > Standard cost section > Current cost > Read-only. This field displays the current standard cost for the stock item.
**defaultIssueFrom**: General information tab > Warehouse defaults section > Default issue from > The location of the warehouse to be used by default to issue quantities of the selected stock item.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**defaultPrice**: Price/cost information tab > Price management section > Default price > The price of the stock item.

**defaultReceiptTo**: General information tab > Warehouse defaults section > Default receipt to > The location of warehouse to be used by default to receive certain quantities of the specified stock item.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**defaultWarehouse**: General information tab > Warehouse defaults section > Default warehouse > The default warehouse used to store the stock item with the specified item ID.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**description**: The top part > Description *> A brief description of the stock item.
**effectiveDate**: Price/cost information tab > Standard cost section > Effective date > Read-only. This field shows the effective date for the current standard cost of the stock item.
**errorInfo**
**intrastat**: General information tab > Intrastat section
**cN8**: Represents the 8 digit level Combine Nomenclature commodity code specific for the year
**countryOfOrigin**: The country of origin of the commodity will be selected,
**supplementaryMeasureUnit**: The requirement for Supplementary Measure Units applies only to certain classes of goods(NC8 Positions)
**inventoryId**: The unique internal identifier of the  item as is stored in the database. This Id is not visible in the window.
**inventoryNumber**: Mandatory field: The top part > Item Id* > The unique alphanumeric identifier of the stock item.
**inventoryUnits**: General information tab > The Unit conversion table just below the Unit of measurement section. Several fields collected from different parts of the window.
**itemClass**: Mandatory field: General information tab > Item defaults section > Item class* > The item class to which the stock item is assigned.
**attributes**
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**type**
**kitItem**
**lastCost**: Price/cost information tab > Standard cost section > Last cost > Read-only. This field showing the last standard cost defined for the stock item.
**lastModifiedDateTime**: Information collected from system.

**lotSerialClass**: Mandatory field: General information tab > Item defaults section > Lot/Serial Class* > The lot serial class ID of the stock item, which by default is the ID associated with the item class.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**metadata**
**maxPageSize**
**totalCount**
**note**: Icon Notes on top of the window > Pop-up window for providing any user-defined text connected to the inventory item.
**packaging**: Packaging tab
**baseItemVolume**: The volume of the <see cref="!:BaseUnit">Base Unit</see> of the item.
**baseItemWeight**: The weight of the <see cref="!:BaseUnit">Base Unit</see> of the item.
**volumeUOM**: The <see cref="!:INUnit">Unit of Measure</see> used for the <see cref="P:Visma.net.ERP.Web.Api.Model.V1.IN.PackagingDto.BaseItemVolume">Volume</see> of the item.
**weightUOM**: The <see cref="!:INUnit">Unit of Measure</see> used for the <see cref="P:Visma.net.ERP.Web.Api.Model.V1.IN.PackagingDto.BaseItemWeight">Weight</see> of the item.
**pendingCost**: Price/cost information tab > Standard cost section > Pending cost > The pending standard cost for the stock item.
**pendingCostDate**: Price/cost information tab > Standard cost section > Pending cost date > The date when the pending standard cost becomes effective.

**postingClass**: Mandatory field: General information tab > Item defaults section > Posting class* > The posting class of the stock item, which by default is the posting class assigned to the item class.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.

**priceClass**: The Price/cost information tab > Price management section > Price class > The item price class associated with the non-stock item. Group stock or non-stock items with similar price calculation methods.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**priceClassID**: The Price/cost information tab > Price management section > Price class > The price class of the item.
**priceManager**: The Price/cost information tab > Price management section > Price manager > The manager responsible for the product pricing.
**name**
**priceManagerID**: The Price/cost information tab > Price management section > Price manager > The ID of the manager responsible for the product pricing.
**priceWorkgroupID**: The Price/cost information tab > Price management section > Price work group > The work group responsible for product pricing. Select the pricing work group for the stock item.
**purchaseUnit**: Mandatory field: General information tab > Unit of measurement section > Purchase unit *> The UoM to be used as the purchase unit for the stock item.
**recommendedPrice**: The Price/cost information tab > Price management section > List price > The manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP) of the stock item.
**salesCategories**: Attributes tab > Sales categories grid
**salesUnit**: Mandatory field: General information tab > Unit of measurement section > Sales unit *> The UoM to be used as the sales unit for the stock item.
**status**: The top part > Item status > The status of the stock item. The alternatives are: Active, No sales, No purchases, No request, Inactive, Marked for deletion.
**stockItem**

**type**: General information tab > Item defaults section > Type > The type of stock item.
